scripts.prepare:goerli-bluechip: mustache config/goerli-bluechip.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/goerli-bluechip.json src/lending-pool.templete.ts > src/lending-pool.ts
scripts.prepare:goerli-growth: mustache config/goerli-growth.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/goerli-growth.json src/lending-pool.templete.ts > src/lending-pool.ts
